title: Have We Seen Donald Trump’s Immigration Plan Before? | Alan Colmes Radio Show
text: Monday on "The Alan Colmes Show," Alan spoke with Professor Francisco Balderrama, the co-author of Decade of Betrayal: Mexican Repatriation in the 1930s. In the book, Professor Balderrama discusses how one million Mexicans and their children were illegally shipped back to Mexico, which ech
